#phenotips 16:12 <sdumitriu> Hm, why do you want to ignore travis? 16:12 <kushalk124> Adain an error in my PR 16:13 <sdumitriu> That one is good 16:13 <sdumitriu> I mean, travis.yml shouldn't be ignored 16:13 <sdumitriu> It's a valid configuration file 16:14 <kushalk124> Its for our build 16:14 <kushalk124> for testing 16:14 <kushalk124> I thought we should ignore it 16:15 <kushalk124> So with this GSOC project working on a new things 16:15 <kushalk124> *thing 16:15 <kushalk124> integrating TRAVIS and tweaking it 16:15 <kushalk124> :) 16:15 <sdumitriu> Well, .gitignore doesn't work like this 16:15 <sdumitriu> Once the file is committed, it can't be ignored 16:15 <sdumitriu> .gitignore is about files/directories that aren't already tracked by git and which should be ignored when listing new files 16:16 <kushalk124> Oh yes 16:16 <kushalk124> it should not be tracked 16:16 <kushalk124> if I use git add . 16:16 <kushalk124> it should not be added 16:16 <sdumitriu> Why not? 16:17 <sdumitriu> The file needs to be committed 16:17 <kushalk124> Hmm 16:21 <sdumitriu> kushalk124: The rule is that files that affect the project need to be committed; files that are specific to a computer shouldn't 16:21 <kushalk124> Ohh 16:21 <kushalk124> So it should be committed 16:21 <sdumitriu> Yes 16:21 <kushalk124> dependcy resolve failed 16:22 <kushalk124> The command "mvn dependency:resolve -Dsilent -T2.0C" failed and exited with 1 during install. 16:22 <sdumitriu> Hm, I wonder if on IRC it only reports failures on master 16:23 <kushalk124> It can be configured to report errors for pull 16:28 <kushalk124> sdumitriu: ? 16:29 <sdumitriu> That's a false error... 16:29 <sdumitriu> The dependency has been downloaded 16:30 <kushalk124> It skipped many 16:30 <kushalk124> Last 3 16:30 <kushalk124> application interface 16:30 <kushalk124> and others 16:30 <sdumitriu> It's OK 16:31 <sdumitriu> They skip whenever the build fails at an earlier stage 16:31 <kushalk124> oh 16:31 <kushalk124> What is the log size on jenkins server ? 16:33 <sdumitriu> 148kb, 1791 lines 16:34 <sdumitriu> But that's on a populated repository 16:34 <kushalk124> Ohh 16:34 <kushalk124> Any other way we can reduce the log 16:37 <kushalk124> For the time we can use jenkins with https://wiki.jenkins-ci.org/display/JENKINS/GitHub+Plugin 16:46 <kushalk124> sdumitriu: ? 16:46 <kushalk124> What you upto ? 16:46 <sdumitriu> Cooking 16:47 <kushalk124> Nice :) 16:47 <kushalk124> Whats for dinner tonight ? 16:47 <sdumitriu> Risotto with mushrooms and aubergines 16:49 <kushalk124> I should not be talking abt food 16:51 <kushalk124> One more fail 17:26 <kushalk124> sdumitriu: Forwarding you the details for VM 17:26 <kushalk124> Ok 17:26 <kushalk124> where should i forward the mail ? 17:26 <sdumitriu> sergiu.dumitriu@gmail.com 17:27 <kushalk124> Forwarded to you 17:39 <sdumitriu> Finally! 17:40 <kushalk124> Finallyy 17:40 <kushalk124> So now we have Build Test on PR :D 17:42 <kushalk124> sdumitriu: Now to do a test PR 17:42 <kushalk124> I think i should work on that issue tonight only 17:43 <sdumitriu> Yeah, and I guess you should stop fixing issues for a while after that, otherwise there won't be any left for other students 17:44 <kushalk124> :P 17:45 <kushalk124> Do we need VM ? 17:49 <sdumitriu> No 17:52 <vshivam> has quit 17:53 <kushalk124> sdumitriu: 17:53 <kushalk124> Sent a PR 17:57 <kushalk124> Trying to rebase 17:58 <kushalk124> Somehow I am getting error all the time 18:01 <sdumitriu> What error? 18:01 <kushalk124> Wait its trying to do 18:01 <kushalk124> My net fails in between 18:01 <kushalk124> with the new firewall 18:01 <kushalk124> in campus 18:01 <kushalk124> Connections break after sometime 18:04 <kushalk124> You asked to pull from the remote 'upstream', but did not specify a branch. Because this is not the default configured remote for your current branch, you must specify a branch on the command line. 18:04 <kushalk124> From what I know 18:04 <kushalk124> If i go to upstream/master 18:05 <kushalk124> I would be on a different head 18:09 <kushalk124> sdumitriu: ? 18:20 <kushalk124> sdumitriu: there ? 18:21 <kushalk124> Check the Last PR 18:22 <kushalk124> I think it should be fit to merge 18:22 <kushalk124> Its 4 AM 18:22 <kushalk124> I will take a leave 18:22 <kushalk124> Good Night , meet you tomorrow 18:24 <sdumitriu> Good night 18:39 <camelia_> has quit
